full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Lightweight Profiling CTD

### Solicitation Number
WS4294426568

### Publication Date
2023-11-14

### Tender Closing Date
2023-11-29T14:00:00

### Unspsc Code
41113800 - Geophysical and geotechnical instruments

### Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity
None

### Regions of Delivery
Newfoundland and Labrador

### Contracting Entity
Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC/PSPC)

### End User Entities
* Ministère Pêches et Océans Canada (DFO)
* Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### Contact Information
* Genevieve Petten (SPAC/PSPC)
* 
* genvieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
Canada is seeking offers from qualified Offerors to provide a profiling CTD (Conductivity, Temperature, Depth sonde) to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation by submitting a written request to the Contracting Authority within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

Note:
* Reference the solicitation for further details.
* The full Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded by logging into your SAP Ariba account and completing your Government of Canada profile.

**Note:**
The tender is now closed. The tender status is "Expired". 

# End of Page
If you need more specific formatting (like tables, headings, and images), you can add additional formatting to make it look better. But first, I will like to point out the following comments about the input:
* When contractors share the content with you, please make sure that it is a readable format. Sometimes, this is very problematic with copied text or with formats that are easier to read for the contractor than for you. You will need to edit these documents thoroughly to turn them into readable Markdown files. 
 Hence, on the provided sharing, we didn't place a sour link, a image or tables like originally sent. The content would not show up with tables like I showed but now it is a number…So.. this is ideal for older internet technologies and easy readable formats of course. Thankful for it 
There are many government tenders
